plot_class_absolute

Source: R/plot_class_absolute.R
plot_class_absolute.Rd

generate summary plot

plot_class_absolute(
  data = NULL,
  theme = NULL,
  theme_default = ggplot2::theme_bw(),
  ncol = 3,
  scales = "free_y",
  size_text = 15,
  size = 1.5,
  break_interval = NULL,
  col_dim = "scenario",
  row_dim = "param",
  summary_line = F,
  data_agg = NULL
)

Arguments

data

Default = NULL.

theme

Default = NULL.

theme_default

Default = ggplot2::theme_bw(). Default rchart themes.

ncol

Default = 3. Number of columns.

scales

Default = "free". Choose between "free", "free_y", "free_x", "fixed"

size_text

Default = 15. Text size

size

Default = 1.5. Line size for summary lines

break_interval

Default = NULL. Intervals between x breaks starting from first x point.

col_dim

Default = "scenario". Choose between "scenario" or "region". Column facet variable.

row_dim

Default = "param". Column facet variable.

summary_line

Default = FALSE. Add parameter summary line to all bar charts.

data_agg

Default = NULL. Aggregated param data for the summary line.
